name: Bullet Bunny (itch)
description:
A bunny has (somehow) got into the line of fire in a gun duel!A simple game where you use the arrow keys to bounce - as well as defy the laws of physics - and dodge all the bullets!This game was designed to be on phone/flash. But at the moment I don't have the cash for an exporter (Yeah clickteam fusion charges for exporters). It would be awesome if you could check out my gofundme to help me upgrade to clickteam's developer version, and html5, sfw, android and apple exporters, leaving a dollar/pound or two is a great way to support me! Thanks :)

Gofundme - https://www.gofundme.com/23gqr3b8

Tweet - @MasterOlum

Email - masterolumgames(at)gmail.com
